Method Detail

defaultConfig

public static PropertyLoader defaultConfig()
Returns a new PropertyLoader configured with the default settings of CCSWEB.
Property loading is additive, with later files overriding settings in earlier files.
In the default config, the following file names are searched for basename "foo", extension "lcf":
  • foo.lcf
  • foo.$hostname.lcf
  • foo.$USER.lcf
  • foo.override.lcf

These files are searched for in the following locations:

  • classpath
  • current directory
  • user HOME directory

The rules are: Later filenames override earlier filenames, within one filename later locations override earlier ones.

So for example, a setting in "foo.lcf" in the current directory is overridden by a setting in "foo.karsten.lcf" in the classpath, which is overridden by "foo.karsten.lcf" in my home directory, which is overridden in turn by "foo.override.lcf" in the classpath.

appConfig

public static java.util.Properties appConfig()

appConfig

public static java.util.Properties appConfig(java.lang.String... baseNames)

cachedLoad

public static java.util.Properties cachedLoad(java.lang.String basename,
                                              java.lang.String appendix)
Loads a fileset with a default PropertyLoader.

Remembers previous invocations with the same parameters, and returns the result from the previous call instead of loading the fileset again.
